title: Drawing, "Ceres asks Jupiter for Return of Proserpina", 1812
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown washes over traces of graphite on light brown paper
inscribed: Inscribed: Cerere prega Giove per ricevere Proserpina; laterali 3
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Ceres shown kneeling before Jupiter throned.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Ceres asks Jupiter for Return of Proserpina", 1812.
1812. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown washes over traces of graphite on light brown paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3283.
